channel.title: Can someone help me with HAM please?
channel.description:
Hi i'm a new HAM user and i would like to know how to enter servers that require ham. I put in the HAM name and PASS then i come to a list of people who it looks like thier on this server, can someone tell me what to do people?
ty in advance for those who help.

item.title: Can someone help me with HAM please?
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

All I know is that you once your on it it is just a talking (crap msn version) and you just copy the owners ip or what they’ve put as the name. Normally good HAM servers (on what i know) have the ip as the name.

Well I hope i helped. =p

Come join here. http://brunescapeforum.runboard.com my new site

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with HAM please?
